name: Dungeon of the Wizard
description:
Welcome to Dungeon of the Wizard! In this game you play as a wizard who is on the edge of unlocking eternal power. You invade a dungeon, which once upon a time belonged to a mighty wizard, take out the enemies, collect the coins and maybe face the ghost of the wizard himself!

This game was made for the Vimjam 2.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Q - Use special ability

I made everything in this game myself expect for the art which you can download here.

Please note that I didn't have a lot of time and made this game in only 4 days so sorry if it isn't great!
